mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no AS id, b.title AS question, b.content AS answer, b.write_date AS createdAt, u.user_name AS writer, b.priority FROM tb_board b LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo u ON b.author = u.user_no WHERE b.board_type = #{board_type} ORDER BY b.priority DESC;
SELECT board_no AS id, board_type, title AS question, content AS answer, write_date AS createdAt, author AS writer, priority FROM tb_board WHERE board_no = #{id}
mapper.insert:
